thread.title: Grand Millennium Dubai Offers Incredible Discounts On Health Club Membership Packages
thread.title_full: Grand Millennium Dubai Offers Incredible Discounts On Health Club Membership Packages

author: Thidawan Tunya
title: Grand Millennium Dubai Offers Incredible Discounts On Health Club Membership Packages
text:
Email 
Grand Millennium Dubai has launched incredible discounts on health club memberships offering an opportunity to improve your health and quality of life. Whether you wish to stay in shape, lose weight or get fit for an upcoming event, the facilities are meant to help you achieve the goal. 
The state-of-the-art health club features a fully equipped gymnasium, swimming pool, jacuzzi and massage facilities. The gym has a specific mix of latest equipments to fulfill your health and fitness requirements including wide variety of cardio, weights and strength training equipment and certified personal trainers to help you achieve your fitness goals. 
Mr. Peter Mansourian, General Manager of Grand Millennium Dubai, said that the members will find the facility motivating that inspires them to achieve their physical best. Even more exciting is the atmosphere helping you focus on your workout. 
“One of the most important features of this membership drive is free personal training. These training sessions are aimed at making your gym experience fun, effective and easy” he added. 
Book your membership package before September 30, 2015 and avail amazing discounts and a host of benefits. Obtain annual membership (Diamond package) for AED3000 and save AED900, besides getting two months complimentary access to the gym, 60 minutes Swedish massage and four personal training sessions free. 
You may also sign up for a six-month membership (Gold package) for AED1800 and save AED400, get one month complimentary access to the gymnasium with two personal training sessions and 30 minutes Swedish massage. 
If you decide to get enrolled for three-month membership (Silver package) for AED1000 you save AED500. Other benefits include one month complimentary access, two personal training sessions and 30 minute massage. 
All members are also entitled for 20 per cent discount on F&B, complimentary valet parking and free WiFi. Terms and conditions apply. Offer not valid in conjunction with any other discount or promotion and based on availability. Share this:
